episodes.synopsis: DEA agents prowl Colombia's international airport, tracking drug couriers and seeking to bust a smuggling ring operated by U.S. military personnel.
episodes.title: Airport Sting

episodes.synopsis: Traffickers often force desperate people to transport their products, and it's up to the DEA to stop the couriers, even at risk to their own lives.
episodes.title: Drug Mules

episodes.synopsis: DEA agents target an elusive cartel in the Caribbean, pursuing the notorious "go-fast" speedboats that transport millions of dollars of illicit cargo.
episodes.title: Drug Speedboats

episodes.synopsis: The agents search the waters of Cartagena for submarines that can hold seven tons of coke. Once caught easily, the subs have become hard to locate.
episodes.title: Narco Sub Mystery

video.title: Inside Cocaine Wars
video.synopsis: Intrepid DEA agents pursue vicious and wily drug traffickers, from Colombia to the Caribbean, in a deadly fight to stop cocaine from reaching America.
